name: BCM Change Dashboard
shortDescription: The BCM Change Dashboard is a tool used primarily by BCRM risk advisors to identify and track changes in metrics related to Plans, Applications and Third Parties.
detailedDescription: This comprehensive dashboard provides real-time insights into Business Continuity Management changes across the organization. It tracks modifications in business continuity plans, application dependencies, and third-party relationships. The tool enables risk advisors to proactively manage and respond to changes that may impact business continuity.
accessInstructions: Request access through IT Service Portal

name: BCM Metrics Tool
shortDescription: The BCM Dashboard is the primary tool that both 1st and 2nd Line teams use to access Business Continuity related metrics and is updated on a daily basis.
detailedDescription: A comprehensive metrics dashboard that serves as the central hub for Business Continuity Management data. It provides daily updates on key performance indicators, compliance metrics, and operational readiness scores. The tool includes several ORP metrics reported on a quarterly basis for executive reporting.
accessInstructions: Available to all BCM team members

name: BCRM MRA Metrics Dashboard
shortDescription: The BCRM MRA Metric Dashboard incorporates elements such as proficiency-to-process mismatches and new metrics related to supporting MRA-related work.
detailedDescription: This specialized dashboard focuses on Minimum Required Activities (MRA) within the Business Continuity and Resiliency Management framework. It tracks proficiency levels, identifies skill gaps, monitors RTO Gap dispositioning, and provides actionable insights for improving organizational resilience.

name: BCRM Workforce Concentration Index Dashboard
shortDescription: The BCRM Workforce Concentration Index Dashboard displays data used to create the Workforce Concentration Index metric.
detailedDescription: This analytical tool measures the concentration of associates and contractors in key regions based on home location. The Workforce Concentration Index is presented as a score using the Herfindahl-Hirschman Index methodology, helping identify geographic concentration risks that could impact business continuity. The dashboard provides insights for workforce distribution planning and risk mitigation strategies.
accessInstructions: Available to HR and BCRM leadership

name: Access Control Metrics Dashboard
shortDescription: Comprehensive dashboard tracking access control metrics, user permissions, and compliance status across all systems.
detailedDescription: This dashboard provides detailed visibility into access control management across the organization. It monitors user access patterns, tracks permission changes, identifies access violations, and ensures compliance with security policies. The tool integrates with identity management systems to provide real-time insights.

name: Enterprise Risk Assessment Tool
shortDescription: Comprehensive risk assessment platform for identifying, evaluating, and managing enterprise-wide risks.
detailedDescription: A sophisticated risk management platform that enables comprehensive risk identification, assessment, and mitigation tracking. The tool supports quantitative and qualitative risk analysis, provides risk scoring, and facilitates risk reporting to senior management and regulators.
